example.text: Meanwhile, House Republicans are pushing a bill that neglects the people behind immigration policy. The Child Deportation Act embraces the same failed, xenophobic policies that promise harsh enforcement and nothing more. It is not a real solution.

Mientras empezamos a procesar este dolor, sé que debemos hacer más para evitar este tipo de violencia en primer lugar. Por eso ayudé a aprobar el Bipartisan Safer Communities Act -la primera ley para prevenir la violencia con armas de fuego en más de dos décadas.
The #USCitizenshipAct will help us grow our economy, make our borders safer and more secure, and deliver a pathway to citizenship for millions of immigrants already living and working here.

Speaker McCarthy is willing to tank thousands of Southern California jobs so he can: ? slash funding for first responders and veterans ? cut resources for public schools and health centers ? roll back efforts to fight climate change Enough is enough. #PeopleOverPolitics [[url]]

House Republicans continue to push extreme policies and call it "enforcement." We need real solutions to fix our broken immigration system. It's what the American people want. And it's what every human being seeking a better life in this country deserves. #USCitizenshipAct [[url]]

It will facilitate opportunities for students to meet with individuals currently serving in Congress, and also the former Members because we are still important, including our staff, both in Washington and in the district offices. It will create a one-semester fellowship for four and six students, which would include a semester internship at the FMC office here in downtown Washington, DC; scheduling meetings each week with current and former Members and staff and ambassadors and embassy staff here in DC on how to pursue the careers in public service; of course, free time on weekends so they can go and see everything that you Irish leaders all want to go and see.
As the daughter of immigrant parents from Mexico, I am honored to introduce the US Citizenship Act today—a bold, transformative framework that will finally fix our broken immigration system. [[url]]
